title: Minimum Time to Collect All Apples in a Tree
content:
Given an undirected tree consisting of  vertices numbered from 0 to , which has some apples in their vertices. You spend 1 second to walk over one edge of the tree. Return the minimum time in seconds you have to spend to collect all apples in the tree, starting at vertex 0 and coming back to this vertex.
The edges of the undirected tree are given in the array , where  means that exists an edge connecting the vertices  and . Additionally, there is a boolean array , where  means that vertex  has an apple; otherwise, it does not have any apple.
